title: Developing a modern website for a Hosting Solutions Enterprise
description: A redesign for a corporate website for a company that offers 40+ cloud solutions and have over 50+ customer stories.
summary: We were thrilled and little nervous when we got this project to design the official website of BG Unified Solutions
Our team worked closely with BG Unified Solutions to create a website that effectively showcases their services and expertise.

link.caption: Visit the official website to explore more
